awards.text: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: A sobering mid-life crisis fuels dissatisfaction in Philip Dimitrius, to the extent where the successful architect trades his marriage and career in for a spiritual exile on a remote Greek island where he hopes to conjure meaning into his life - trying the patience of his new girlfriend and angst-ridden teenage daughter.

title: Tempest
